name: Snowflake's Chance
description: A scurrying, scampering side-scroller. Run, dodge and hide from a menagerie of hand drawn nasties in this brutal indie platformer. You have 99 chances to escape The Pit. There is no hope.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1 Processor: :AMD Phenom 9750 or Pentium D 800+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7800 GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 3000+ or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
